As a single player gamer this really drew me out of my shell and makes online multiplayer fun. It has its flaws, such as being more survivor sided and need minor adjustments, but aside from the small flaws its a great game to play alone or with friends. It does a good job at making the grind to level up and progress feel both earned and just hard enough. Overall id highly recommend the game to those looking for a fun multiplayer experience who enjoy the horror genre.

Best horror-survival game that I've played for the past few years. I really enjoy the variety of killers and survivors the game has to offer. BHVR devs have done a lot for this game and I'm happy they continue too, the game has grown so much from year one. The game is very enjoyable playing solo or with friends, have met some really cool peeps playing this game. Only thing I dislike are the toxic people who think are entitled.

Update: Still a great game, the developers release patches constantly and new survivors/killers.

review remix.
dbd USED to be awesome (in a lot of ways for sure) but one of the best things, to me, is i dont let the small fry nonsense get to me. re queue, get off, smoke a cigarette..i dont see why people get SO mad at what isnt technically t baggin unless youre ghostface really. anways i digress.
that was my favorite aspect. especially being mainly solo queue player.
BUT i just realized, most of my time, well maybe half now, was on xbox years ago. now that crossplay is a thing, console still has no chat. so i was never really concerned bc it didnt exist. messages? whos got time for that.
but pc....we got crybabies, stubborn people who cant tell you what devils advocate is but claim to be tolernat meanwhile  and then call me an asshole even though i try real hard to be nice and just assume they got kicked in the head by a mule and allow their ignorance to continue being a blantant disregard for common sense.
TILL tough guy steam discussion moderator aka Officer Doofey (vacuum in hand, whistle in ass hole as his butt plug) wanted something to tell his ... id say wife, but... vacuum...when he got home so he bans me from discussions for quoting sopranos EVEN THO THEY WERE PERTAINING TO my opinions on thread about game.
and ya. he thinks hes cool.
i refuse to support this dev team a penny more simply due to this loser's ego and delusions of grandeur as a steam discussion mod for a game hangin on for dear life.

OBJECTIVELY
this game got...lost down a wrong turn years ago.
all it is is a cash grab with micro transactions THAT SUCK ASS btw, really no fundamentally genuine attempts at balance, as in, they would rather push a new killer, release them wit bugs, then fix em, and patch it. or any other number of genius ideas that has came out of this game.
fuck them. until they apologize for their hypocrisy and what they would like to believe, virtue.

One of the best multiplayer horror games I have ever played, the developers keep updating the game with new balance patches, DLC's and they listen to the community. But the game is not perfect there are some really really toxic players in the community and there are a few bugs here and there. But there are way less bugs now than back in 2016. I can only recommend DBD it's an amazing game!

Сильно усложненный симулятор ссалочек. 
Хотя испуга смачного от игры давно не стоит ждать, прекрасное комьюнити даст вам наслаждаться игрой в лучшем случае.
А нежнейшие создатели лишний раз обновлением напомнят вам что игра это "симулятор лобби" или "ошибка вы отключены" . Краши, вылеты, ожидания , это все про это игру.(хотя они и исправляются)
Ну и генераторы, токсик сурвы и токсик маны тоже про нее.(но это не точно)
За последнее время игра преображается и даже попадаются "хорошие люди" что и в люк отнесут и даже каточку затащат.
Берите если зацепило , после 20 часов полюбите и как в любимою Помоечку будете возвращаться.
